#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);

long long int t,n,c;

cin>>t;

while(t--)
{
    cin>>n>>c;

        int f=0;

        double temp2=(double)2*(double)c-(double)n*(double)(n-1)*(double)2;


        double ans=temp2/((double)2*(double)n);

        if(temp2>=(double)1&&ans==(long long int)ans&&ans>=(double)1)
            f=1;

         temp2=(double)2*(double)c-(double)n*(double)(n-1)*(double)1;


        ans=temp2/((double)2*(double)n);

        if(temp2>=(double)1&&ans==(long long int)ans&&ans>=(double)1)
            f=1;


        if(f==1)
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"No"<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
